name: Roche Caiman: The Split Rune
description: Lightning-split boulder rune carved then struck. Four cracks radiate. Two rune halves. One chalk circle uniting them. Key pressed; measurements taken. Riddle: When a word is broken, its pieces still add up.
prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card, muted sepia + indigo + teal + faint gold highlights. Ritual haunting atmosphere, layered symbolic composition. Lightning-split boulder rune carved then struck. Four cracks radiate. Two rune halves. One chalk circle uniting them. Key pressed; measurements taken.. Key props numeric: 4 cracks, 2 halves, 1 circle. Cipher letter: S Bearing: 90°. Intricate line engraving, subtle volumetric mist, painterly etched hybrid
